website_summaries.verdict: A basic design with some quality issues. You may like it if you don't have a lot of items to transport.
pros: An upright model w/a deep interior and strong steel frame
cons: Though rated to hold 100 lbs., some users report that it won't handle that much weight in sand
the more you put in it, the harder it is to maneuver

customer_reviews.title: Photo says all
customer_reviews.text: I tried to contact the seller but no button exists to do so. Bottom line, I took this to the beach and in the first trip the front wheel came off. See photo. I do not believe this product is well made. A solid wheel vice a rubber donut on a plastic hub would be more reliable. Spoke to a couple on the beach who had a Tommy Bahama. Costs a bit more but appears it is better made. I bought this a month in advance of beach trip so can't return it either. Would appreciate if the seller could send a replacement wheel.
customer_reviews.author: dranger

customer_reviews.title: Tire Cracked After Second Use
customer_reviews.text: Everyone can agree that getting beach gear with a 2 year old and 4 year old is no easy task... that's why we were really about this product! Well, during our second use one of the front tires cracked. See picture attached.
customer_reviews.author: Linz

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Tires
customer_reviews.text: This cart is only 4 months old and only used less than 10 times. The one tire is coming apart and cracked. I only take from the parking lot to beach so it doesn't get much use. Everything else about the cart is awesome! If you buy the cart better buy the 2 or 3 year warranty also.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Wish they had these carts with my kids were little! This is a well-balanced, sturdy cart that holds tons of stuff. I have to say this because I've seen too many people get mad at the carts....: You need to be smart when you're loading the cart. If you put something heavy in the pouch on the big wheel side, the cart will tip over. We've put 4 camp chairs (the kind that fold up and go in cases), an umbrella, and a mini cooler in the mesh basket, and towels in the pouch, and it's been easy to pull on the sand and doesn't lose it's balance. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B.

customer_reviews.title: Rear wheels!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cart two years ago. It’s a great product and worked flawlessly for two years. After two years one rear wheel cracked down the middle making the cart unusable. I left a phone message with Rio Brands and a week later two replacement wheels were delivered by UPS (free of charge). I am confident I will get at least two more years use out of this product. Excellent product, responsive customer service.
customer_reviews.author: J D

customer_reviews.title: Our dog loved the ride!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loaded everything in it , even the dog , for the walk to the beach from the house. Loved it. Our only complaint is that it was tough pulling it through the sand. Wished it had better wheels . With that said, it was way better than trying to carry everything. We saw people struggling with the little beach wagons way more than we did with this cart . Those with the wagons had to pull wagons and had chairs falling out and difficulty positioning the umbrellas. However, with our cart, we had no problem and everything fit on this one cart. No regrets and would definitely buy again but I think we will order some better tires.
customer_reviews.author: james oxley

customer_reviews.title: It's a total piece of junk and was a complete waste of my money!!!
customer_reviews.text: EXTREMELY DISSATISFIED WITH THIS PURCHASE!!! We bought it as a gift for my dad, to replace his old Wonder Wheeler. 1.) The front wheels on this new one do not rotate like they should, making it extremely difficult to maneuver. 2.) The back wheels squeak and squeal very loudly. 3.) When loaded with chairs, the fold-down bar that holds them sinks past the plastic pieces that are supposed to stop it from drooping too low. This causes the chairs to either hit the front wheels or graze the ground. I don't recommend this cart to anyone, and I really wish we could get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bring your muscles
customer_reviews.text: It moves nicely on the walkways but once you get on that sand you better bring your muscles! Not as easy as one would think. Don’t put a large cooler filled on it or bring a ton of beach crap. All I put on it is 2 beach chairs, a small collapsible cooler that fits 2 sandwiches & 4 water bottles & I also bring a beach bag with 2 towels & sunscreen & It’s so heavy!!! I think you’re better off carrying your stuff. He usually beats me to the beach spot but not when he has to drag that thing.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly and makes a trip to the beach much easier!
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly and makes a trip to the beach much easier! We were amazed at how much this little cart could carry, and how much easier it made hauling beach chairs, bags, and toys all the way to the beach. I would assume some of the more negative comments either did not install the wheels properly, or had unrealistic expectations. NOTHING is going to push easily on sand, so yes, you will need to pull it once you are walking on sand. Wish they had these when I was younger!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Just Ok
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to enjoy our beach trips. Assembly was a bit difficult but managed to get everything together. Paint on part of the handle was chipped off upon delivery. Decided to just keep it and not hassle with a return. Chipped paint hasn’t caused any problems but the spring loaded release handles are poorly made. Came apart on our second use of the cart. Thank goodness my husband was with and had tools because I would have ended up throwing it away. Rolls great on firm sand but you basically have to drag it in thick or soft sand.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: CHANGED MY BEACH-GOING LIFE!!
customer_reviews.text: CHANGED MY BEACH-GOING LIFE!! Totally worth every penny. Easy to assemble and breaks down flat for putting in the back of my RAV4. So easy to haul all the necessaries and nice-to-haves to the beach. Easily holds two umbrellas, sand chairs, cooler, lunch, large and small beach towels, hats, beach tote bag, books, magazines, etc. Smoothly pushes forward like a stroller on smooth, hard surfaces. Easily pulled forward on large back wheels to negotiate the soft sand of southeast Florida. EASY is the key word here!
customer_reviews.author: kb

customer_reviews.title: Will never go to the beach without this
customer_reviews.text: Careful loading this. It will topple over if you hang chairs off the chair rack in the front without balancing the weight in the back. The wheels are nice, but I still had to drag it through the sand, and it is harder the heavier the load. Overall a great tool for the beach. I was able to fit 2 chairs, towels, umbrella, beach tent, small cooler, diaper bag, personal items such as phone, wallet, glasses, sunscreen and multiple beach toys. It really holds everything you could possibly need for a day at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: S. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Bring everything you need to.the beach
customer_reviews.text: I bought this same cart about 7 years ago and it held up nicely. Finally one wheel kept falling off (a piece of plastic broke off). I decided to buy the same cart again as I'm generally happy with the product. It holds a ton of beach stuff. If traveling on a boardwalk, concrete or hard packed sand, it's easy to push like a regular cart. If however your sand is deep, you need 2 people to pull the cart. Overall, I still love the product. Just need to know how to maneuver. Worth the trouble as we have everything we need for an enjoyable beach day.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie B

customer_reviews.title: we’ve only used it nice but it carried 4 large folding chairs
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised, we’ve only used it nice but it carried 4 large folding chairs, a sun umbrella, a medium size cooler full of drinks, a 2 grocery size bags stuffed with towels, a huge bag full of toys, a bag of clothes and a backpack. We probably shouldn’t have it so much weight on it, I’m sure we were close to max if not over. At first the wheels dug in a bit when pulling, but then they rolled and made the trip down the sand so much better.
customer_reviews.author: MEG G

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: PRO: Easy to assemble, fold easily and take minimal space in the car trunk. Large capacity, can fit a lot of stuff CONS: Material and quality need improvement. Lost and screw after only 2 min of use and finding a new one was a headache (not US standard size)... Painful maneuverability in the sand, does not roll easily
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to using this
customer_reviews.text: For so many years I've carried the umbrella, chairs, cooler, etc., etc and when you get older it becomes much more of a PIA. So I saw these around some of the beaches I frequent and just knew the time had come to get my own. I got it but in reading the reviews I thought I would get 'insurance' against any kind of breakage. I bought three years worth for about 7 bucks. I should be good to go. Will let my public know if this disappoints.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Yonke II

customer_reviews.title: OMG!!! We LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: I cannot tell you how awesome this cart is on Texas sand. It's so much easier to maneuver than it looks and especially when loaded down (with more than you think it can handle!!) We get lots of looks from people who watch us unload as if we were a clown car...we just keep unpacking and unpacking and unpacking... If you're thinking about it, hear me when I say as a mom of 2 and a husband who has his own fishing gear to haul - this cart has made getting all our crap to where we need to be so much easier!!
customer_reviews.author: 8Legs & 24paws

customer_reviews.title: Invaluable for families heading to the beach!
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing worse than getting all packed up, kids in their swimsuits, head out the resort and to the beach, only to realize that you forgot something. Worse yet, that one of the kids dropped their towel somewhere in between. The Rio Beach Wonder beach cart has been a lifesaver. It has traveled with us on every beach trip for the past several years. I love that we can load all our stuff up and easily transport it to the beach. The wide back wheels make pulling it across the soft sand a breeze, and hard surfaces are even easier. We are able to easily take off all 4 of the wheels for compact packing.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Denniston

customer_reviews.title: Keep em Rollin.
customer_reviews.text: The Rio Beach Wonder is a great tool for dragging all of your junk to the beach. I pack 2 chairs, an umbrella, cold drinks, towels and other needs into the basket and I have room to spare. The wheels are plastic yet sturdy and easily move across sand. Beats carry it all!! Recommended and it will help you get to the sun and fun without dropping stuff all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: TJMjr

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve used the cart heavily over the past 2 beach seasons and are amazed at how much it can haul. Very durable and sturdy, even getting on and off the ferry. Two weeks ago, one of the front plastic wheels cracked. Luckily, the cart still rolled home. I called the company’s customer service/part request number. I left my info and the description of the front wheels I needed. WITHIN THREE DAYS, a new set of front wheels arrived at my door. Now that’s service! I easily snapped off the old wheels and popped on the new ones and we’ll be using our cart this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: ShortyK11

customer_reviews.title: bad front wheels
customer_reviews.text: the cart itself is very nice but after 3 weeks of use the right front wheel cracked making the cart useless. i contacted the seller and received no response to a request for replacement front wheels. DO NOT BUY THIS CART!
customer_reviews.author: joseph williams

customer_reviews.title: A must have for the beach
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases we made for our beach vacations. For two of us plus 3 Golden Retrievers, we have a bit of gear to carry to the beach. The house we stay in is only 100 ft from the beach entrance but before the cart we sometimes had to make two trips. Juggling the gear and dogs. With the cart I can haul everything we need - umbrella, chairs, drinks, water, toys, mat, etc. one trip and the cart bears the weigh of the gear.
customer_reviews.author: Bill G

customer_reviews.title: Not what they used to be
customer_reviews.text: I have owned one before and so I thought it would be the same quality. It was not.. the netting was torn at the corner and then t was made swing the pins to hold the back wheels on.. no instructions to contact the manufacturer for replacement so I am stuck with purchasing $20 with of variety of pins to find the right size. Overpriced and wouldn’t recommend due to the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A.

customer_reviews.title: Roomy, needs better traction
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Easy to open and close. Very roomy....fits TONS of stuff. The only con was when we had it loaded up it was hard to drag across a Long Beach in thick white sand. I really wish it had better treads, maybe rubber. The grooves/treads were great on boardwalk, sidewalk, etc but it was a two man job getting this thing off the beach when it had stuff on it.
customer_reviews.author: NoNonsense

customer_reviews.title: Why didn’t we buy one years ago?
customer_reviews.text: We just returned from Ocean City MD. We stayed at the wider end of the beach. The cart made getting down to the water to set up everything so much easier, chairs, big umbrella, etc. Since it arrived the morning we left home my husband put it together in the hotel parking lot......no problem.
customer_reviews.author: WMA

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and decent sized but the top tote was missing. I contacted the seller who said they would send one right out and I never did get it. I had to return to Amazon for an exchange. Also the red hook that keeps it folded doesn't stay hooked so it's constantly unfolding. If it I hadn't already put it together I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, will hold plenty, hard to pull
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to assemble out of the box and held a great deal of beach ware. 3 small chairs, a small cooler bag, pop up tent, beach towels and blanket all fit easily. It was very sturdy with no tipping. It was very difficult to pull over sand. Needs much larger wheels made for all terrain. You will get a workout basically dragging this to your desired location on the beach, as the wheels don’t turn easily when the cart is full. When the sand is burning hot, this buggy won’t move fast enough for you to get relief so wear sneakers when using it. Still better than whiny teenagers and multiple trips to the car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for price
customer_reviews.text: Holds a lot of things. Small cooler, beach chairs in bag, umbrella, towels and other. Will not carry a large cooler so stay with smaller, (get a wagon if you have to have large cooler). Maneuvers well in sand but you must pull it on large back wheels (a must for any sand) rather than trying to push. True of any type cart other than a wagon. When folding the swivel front wheels must be inside the frame to close properly.
customer_reviews.author: BigBadT

customer_reviews.title: 27.5” width across wheels
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful cart. Unfortunately, it is too wide (27.5” with wheels) to easily go thru my 35” screened door that has a frame as well as a closer that doesn't allow it to swing wide open. It can angle out or go out folded, but not easily while loaded. If you have a garage or wide door swing, its a fabulous cart.
customer_reviews.author: Ollie

customer_reviews.title: Does not Lock, as my older model never had an issue with this.
customer_reviews.text: Easy Set up and works well on the beach. The storage process for locking the carrier does not work. The red clasp to secure the carrier for storage does not stay locked. Not real happy with this, as my older model I purchased 3 years ago, I never had an issue. Unfortunately, I am not happy with this product as a result of this not functioning properly.
customer_reviews.author: David Keely

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product with very misleading description
customer_reviews.text: I received a different product than what was described in this listing. There is no umbrella holder, no cooler, and no tote bag. It’s very cheap and unsturdy. It’s even a different color. It’s a medium blue with red and white flowers at the bottom and a red handle. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed...mesh bag is divided into three parts not one large bag. No grommets to attach tote. Wasted item. The latch does not hold and pops open no matter what you do. Highly disappointed in this item. Tommy Bahama carts are the best ashame they are hard to get.
customer_reviews.author: Toni A

customer_reviews.title: Nice big sturdy unit.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t rank durability yet. It’s exactly what I wanted. We needed something heftier to carry oversized zero gravity chairs to the beach. This is a good, big, sturdy unit. I’m pretty sure I’ll have to buy a new one on 3 years. They tend to rust by the sea due to the salt in the air (we sore it in our cabana).
customer_reviews.author: Paul E Carson

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Holds a ton of stuff. Like that the chairs can be put on the front. Like the bag that attaches - it’s pretty deep, and has pockets on the sides. Rolled great through the same. Took maybe 3 minutes to assemble. Folds down easily
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Back wheels did not fit - bad design change
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. I've owned one of these beach carts before and needed a new one. The first one I received the wheels did not fit on the axel. The axle was too short, it needed to be about 1/2 inch longer. I figured it was just a defect so I sent it back and ordered a replacement. That one had the same issue. The wheel design does not match what's in the pictures. The pictures show an axle with a cotter pin. Looks like they chnaged the design to be a nut instead of the cotter pin except the axle is too short to properly seat both the nuts and washers w/o the wheels falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Poor chair hold bar design
customer_reviews.text: Major issue with the front chair hold bar. The bar that holds beach chairs is only held up by two small pressure brackets. It easily slides past these brackets and our beach chairs were dragging on the ground. What’s the point of the cart if my wife and kids have to carry their chairs to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: M. Els

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever for a beach-going family of four!
customer_reviews.text: With four people, we haul a cooler, two large beach bags, four beach chairs, two folding cabanas, and two body boards...this was DEFINITELY a necessity. Shipping was quick, and the cart works exactly as we'd hoped. Was glad I ordered one with the wider wheels, because it is challenging on sand. Would absolutely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Gergets

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and reliable
customer_reviews.text: I've owned one before the one I have now. they last for a very long time if they are not abused. I use mine for carrying shopping items from the car to my condo. the one caveat is the huge wheels make it awkward getting in/ out of my front door. luckily I have double doors, but a single door would not allow you to get it out.
customer_reviews.author: S. SCOTT

customer_reviews.title: Must have product!
customer_reviews.text: We have used a Rio Beach Wonder Wheeler on our beach vacations for years. Just recently purchased this one with the wider wheels, and I have to say it really makes a difference in the sand, much easier to roll. We load it down with a beach tent, five beach chairs, towels, games, beach umbrella, etc., and it works like a charm. These are a must have for family beach vacations! Or anywhere you have to carry a lot of things. We also used it to help unload the car upon arrival and for groceries.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Wheel cracked at the seam during 2nd trip to the beach
customer_reviews.text: One of the rear wheels split after using 2 times. The Cart does hold a fair amount of beach things and we were excited after the first use. I believe the wheels being plastic is not a good design and would look into another way to transport items to the beach. Too bad as we did like the cart quite a bit. If you could buy parts such as wheels that would help as well. Do not need another whole cart. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Richard DiPalma

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL ON SAND
customer_reviews.text: I bought the cart that looked the strongest. Well, it may be strong as long as you are not trying to wheel it on sand. I was literally stuck on the beach yesterday, the first time I used it. A man was kind enough to help me. I had dumped everything out and was trying to carry things individually. It was a disaster. I destroyed the box so I cannot return it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Messing

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Stop making a million trips back and forth to your car....
customer_reviews.text: This cart has saved me so many trips back and forth to my car... this cart is totally worth it. I usually go to the beach or the lake with just my son and I and trying to manage a 5 y.o. and all his beach toys, towels, cooler, umbrella makes it hard, but this cart took care of the unnecessary trips. It collapses to the size of a baby stroller, so it was easy to put in the back of my car and equally as easy to open too. I loaded this thing up with so much stuff this summer and not once did I worry that it wouldn't make it. Buy it, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Teacherlady

customer_reviews.title: Makes being a beach sherpa a bit easier...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a trip to the beach. Worked very well to haul lots of "stuff" for four people. The wide rear tires worked OK on soft sand, worked great on firm/wet sand. Beach chairs hung on the front tend to interfere with the front wheels but is only an issue on hard surfaces when you try to push the the cart. It's easier to pull. Only real complaint is that it is difficult to store when folded. Fat wheels make it bulky and have not figured out a way to hang it. Overall, happy and satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: x888jmo

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product
customer_reviews.text: I DO NOT RECOMMEND this product. I bought this for a Christmas gift for my parents to use at their shore house. We put it together for the 2020 Summer, used it twice and the two front wheels keep falling off and keep bending. I contacted the seller and they told me there was nothing they could do because to much time passed. Well obviously you can not use this in December, first use was this summer. I was asking for a replacement product or a refund and they said there was nothing they can do but to contact Amazon. I would NOT recommended this item or seller since they DO NOT stand by their product.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Used it for my two week vacation on the beach. The bag ripped during the first week of use and I ended up losing my fitbit because of it. Just was not worth the money when the entire bag ripped the first week. Also was not easy to push on the sand. Very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: So worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a life changer. I love the beach, but lugging chairs, towels, bags, snacks, coolers, umbrellas, etc. makes it such a task. You throw literally everything in this cart and push it. No bags slipping off your shoulder or cutting off your circulation. Only used it a few times so far, but it seems pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for both the lazy and the weak!  (I am both!)
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest invention since someone created the beach. I've had so much radiation treatment that my skin must be slathered in sunscreen whenever I venture outside and even then, I have to avoid sunlight. This makes my love for the beach basically deadly. To avoid said death, my wife and I have to take many a contraption with us to the beach so that I may avoid as much sun as possible. Walking from the car and eventually back was so cumbersome that we hardly went to the beach before we bought this but since our purchase, we were able to go about 9 times this past summer! I mean, talk about amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Paulash

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: My family and I rented a beach house this past summer which was 4 blocks from the beach. I knew that carrying all of our accessories to the water would make that walk a struggle every day we were there. I bought this cart after reading several positive reviews online and I am SO glad that I did! It was absolutely perfect and made those walks to the beach much easier. It was sturdy, easy to assemble and reasonably priced. We will be using it every summer from now on. Do not hesitate to purchase this cart.
customer_reviews.author: Maverick

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed in this beach cart. While it holds a lot and rolls relatively easily over the sand, I think the quality is not very high. I've had this for just over a month (I just missed the 30 day return window; otherwise I'd be sending it back). One of the back wheels is separating along the seam (it's a hard plastic wheel, not rubber) and I just realized I lost one of the "tires" from the front wheel so it's now lopsided and more difficult to push. We've only used it a half dozen times; I don't think it should already be falling apart. Definitely wouldn't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Don’t go to the beach without this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! With two small kids and tons of beach gear, this was a must for our beach trip. It was easy to pack into the car. It was easy to assemble as well. We used it for toys, chairs, towels, boogie boards and a cooler. I should have bought one sooner. I can’t live without it!
customer_reviews.author: Anmei

customer_reviews.title: Sorry I did not buy this years ago!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had bought this years ago. It holds everything!! So many different places to put things. Completely full it was a little hard for me to pull but with someone helping me it glided right across the sand. It's also pretty easy to maneuver on concrete as well as in and out of elevators. This is so much better than having to carry everything by hand on the beach. Especially at the end of the day when you're hot and tired. Just throw everything in the cart and go! I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to free our hands while walking toward the beach because we have two small kids and it is AWESOME! highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item.
customer_reviews.text: Another item that my family thought unnecessary for our beach trip, but it turned out that it was extremely helpful. As we had a new grandson on our vacation this year, we had a few more items to bring along. This cart held 4 beach chairs, a large beach bag with all the accessories, and an umbrella. The large wheels managed the sand in South Carolina very well, but I would imagine it might be a bit more of a struggle if the sand isn't quite so packed. In some spots, we needed to pull rather than push, but it was still a wonderful help. I hope it holds up after a few years. I'll update after our next vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Bollinger

customer_reviews.title: Super glue
customer_reviews.text: Work well had no problems with the wheels. Others said the front axle kept coming loose so I took the nut off and put some super glue on each axle so it wouldn’t loosen up. Put a little glue on the seems where they ended to help with the seems coming loose.
customer_reviews.author: rocky

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cart
customer_reviews.text: It folds a little awkwardly (front/chair arm flaps) when you try to open it, and it can be a bit tough to unlock (disengage) the spring-loaded arm to fold it closed. Otherwise, it works like a champ. We hauled all our beach stuff with no problem, pulling it across the sand. We were staying in a kitchenette room and we also used it to haul groceries and beverages up to our room in one trip. We saw several others of these in use and everyone seemed to be enjoying them. We'd recommend this beach cart.
customer_reviews.author: GB Doug

customer_reviews.title: FRONT WHEEL FELL OFF AFTER ONE USE
customer_reviews.text: I used the cart once and the front wheel fell off and would not re-attach. Also the zippers are difficult to operate. If the umbrella pouch on the right hand side is used, it interferes with the operation of the front wheel. I bought this cart in 2012 for my daughter and it is still in use. This new cart seems very cheaply made. It's going back!!
customer_reviews.author: babs

customer_reviews.title: Best. thing i have bought for the beach
customer_reviews.text: Best .thing i have bought for the beach! My 89 yo dad is visiting and he likes the zero gravity chairs. I have lugged 2 of those up and down the beach from the parking area. Since I am no longer a spring chicken, this cart is the best to fit those along with the beach umbrella, small cooler and beach bag. It was also super simple to put together!
customer_reviews.author: cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product very much. I loaded it with 2 foldable beach chairs, a beach umbrella a beach tent and 2 bags full of stuff. It was very easy to push while on the boardwalk and on the sand, I pulled it.
customer_reviews.author: VSMa

customer_reviews.title: Easily transport everything to the beach in one trip
customer_reviews.text: We got this for a family beach vacation. It made transporting everything to the beach much easier. We loaded it up and only had to make one trip. It needs to be assembled and I found the directions somewhat lacking. But we found a good YouTube video online which saved us. It is a bit bulky so you’ll need a place with enough space to store it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharmcg

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk. Bought as a Christmas present, just used for the first time on beach vacation last week... by day 4 of use a wheel fell off, the netting came off the top AND a hole ripped in the bottom where the beach umbrella was
customer_reviews.author: Julianne Conard

customer_reviews.title: Got this as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my mom who used it to hold laundry. She ended up getting a bigger one because it's not that big but it works for small or medium loads.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ogleari

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to roll over the sand
customer_reviews.text: This cart saved us on beach trips. It holds so much stuff including 4 lounge chairs on the front. Super easy to roll over the sand. I use this every weekend and would definitely recommend to anyone who lives on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Crazybrit6

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I hoped it would be
customer_reviews.text: This cart is exactly what I hoped it would be. Its light weight and durable, holds all of our beach necessities and is easily pulled threw the sand. I have used it two dozen times and do not have one complaint about it. It makes what used to be a difficult trip for me, much much easier. Mammas happy=everyones happy!
customer_reviews.author: m.sou

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Don't mess around with Tommy Bahamas's cart brand any longer!! This one is WAYYYYY better. Strong and sturdy and it's def gonna hold up longer. I am glad I splurged to buy this one. We use this cart for swim meets, camping, baseball games, and beach days. It holds a TON of stuff
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: best invention ever
customer_reviews.text: I wish the handle bag would clip on instead of just hanging freely on the grommets. At least one of the corners comes unhooked pretty much every time I put something in or take something out of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Green

customer_reviews.title: One Trip to Unload Groceries from Car
customer_reviews.text: Use this to carry groceries from car, up the ramp, into kitchen. Can make one trip. Big wheels are stable. Placed 12 pack sodas on bottom, rest of groceries in mesh bag. Bread and chips in smaller bag near handle.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Daves

customer_reviews.title: LoDs of Room and so easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for us.. Large Beach Bag, Large backpack, Soft lunch cooler, 2 chairs and umbrella - with room to spare. Easy to fold and unfold.. handles great on our walk from car to beach.
customer_reviews.author: Jefmil52

customer_reviews.title: Broke after first use
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT sturdy at all. I used to have one of these years ago and they stood up to a LOT. This one won't even lock into place to stay open, one of the side bars already broke. I want to return it, but I don't even see a place where I can. Total waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: Overall good. Disliked how fast the large wheels are wearing. Can hold more weight than I thought. Will save trips. If cooler is filled and cart is not it will tip over.
customer_reviews.author: jim bloodgood

customer_reviews.title: Truly a beach wonder
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, roomy and rolls nicely. This cart was a god send on our recent trip to the beach. It held all our towels sand toys umbrella and we had room for my 15 month old granddaughter to stand inside for our walk to the beach. She loved the ride and once we got on the beach we took her out because once on the beach we pulled the cart across the sand ( we pushed the cart while on the sidewalks/boardwalk). Just be mindful of how much you put in because that the more weight the tougher the pulling through the sand. It does fold up nicely too. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Donnagirl

customer_reviews.title: Works ok, depends on texture of sand.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a little hard to pull on the beach, the square profile wheels made a lot of resistance. If they rounded the edges it may be easier to pull. Otherwise works ok, pretty bulky for my taste
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: After the second use the front wheels broke off..
customer_reviews.text: I liked it a lot the first time I used it, but the second time it broke. The parts surrounding the wheels are made of plastic. the metal part that goes up in the cart broke off, not sturdy enough for the weight of 4 chairs and an umbrella and two beach bags.
customer_reviews.author: Gina K.

customer_reviews.title: If you bring a lot of gear to the beach, you need this!
customer_reviews.text: This has made going to the beach so much better. Rather than making 10 trips to the car and back lugging all our beach gear, one easy trip does it. It's large enough to fit a full canopy tent, 4 beach chairs, a beach bag, soft cooler, a football, beach ball, and lots of toys. Try carrying all that on your own. The wide wheels make it much easier to pull through sand. The jury is still out on durability since the material does look like it could tear easily; however, it hasn't yet. If and when it does, I'll update the review.
customer_reviews.author: Jdeo

customer_reviews.title: Wide Wonder Wheeler
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the many features this cart had. A place to stow your umbrella. A place for your chair and the netted sack to store your towel/blanket/spread. The cart also allowed me to tow my light weight cooler. The only negative is when you are towing this cart a distance across the sand, your work is cut out for you. The tires keep it from sinking, but the pulling is not as easy as one would think. Overall, it did everything I expected. It is sturdy and it's nice looking. I got my money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Phill H.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We bought this cart right before our beach vacation. It worked great for carting lots of items to and from the beach. The beach was quite wide so we walked far with the cart. No problems! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Debra Z

customer_reviews.title: Great beach cart, especially appreciated after a long afternoon at the beach.
customer_reviews.text: Love this beach cart. For a few years I was in denial about needing one but as we were getting older and accumulating more beach stuff it became more of a necessity. What a great cart. It rolls easy and you just need to remember to pull when you are in the sand instead of push. Our grandkids will be visiting up soon and it will carry all our supplies and theirs as well.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Modeen

customer_reviews.title: Cart is helpful but!
customer_reviews.text: The cart is helpful but in powdery sand the back wheels don’t turn much. Be prepared to drag the cart. The front wheels look to be the weak link. Pushing this cart is only as good at the condition of the parking lot and walkway to the beach. Most of the time I pull it on the back wheels. Being tall I find the handle to short so it makes it harder to pull.
customer_reviews.author: Brad F

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Was very skeptical but this was not too large, folds nicely, held EVERYTHING for a 6 person family, including a cooler, toys, towels, bags, etc. Our youngest ever sat on top while we pulled it through the sand (which was a breeze with the giant tires!) Strudy and worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Cierra Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea but it broke before it was really used.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my mother in law. She called to let us know that it just fell apart. She said "i was putting it together and (didn't have anything in it yet)...i was trying to lock it and it just fell apart... the locking part caved in." She also let us know that she had another one that lasted for seven years. "i had the other one for almost 7 years...the only thing wrong with it was the wheels...this one didn't last at all and i only paid 19.99 for the old one...i'm sure you paid a lot for the new one!"
customer_reviews.author: LF

customer_reviews.title: Get this for the beach!!
customer_reviews.text: Our condo was about 300 yards from the beach on vacation. We are a family of 6, so we take A LOT to the beach for the day. This cart was so worth it!!! I put a huge heavy cooler on the bottom, plus towels, a ton of beach toys, snacks, a very large beach umbrella, chairs, and stacked four inflatables on the very top. It rolled great even on the sand when pulled big wheels first. We were even able to tackle stairs at the end of the boardwalk without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We love our cart. We put larger wheels on it, which made it easier to roll through sand. This is the second one which we 've had. The first cart we had for several years, but one of the bars bent.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good but still hard to use in Gulf Coast beach sand. Better than most. Easy to fold and store. Hold a lot and is sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Randy Crittenden

customer_reviews.title: Great beach cart!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was very handy for us to use on the beach. I have back problems and my elderly parents came with us. It was easy to maneuver in the sand and held everything we needed it to. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: robin0519

customer_reviews.title: Nice beach cart
customer_reviews.text: Nice cart that holds a ton of stuff. not crazy about the removable pouch, seems like the plastic material won't hold up, but all-in-all, it worked good. Doesn't pull over sand as easy as i would like, but nothing really does. Still better than a strolled we had used in the past. It also seems expensive for what it is, but the price is in range or other brands so you're not getting ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton David Hague

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 5 uses
customer_reviews.text: This cart seemed pretty flimsy from the start--small wheels, thin material, plastic parts. It was difficult to place/keep in the locked/upright position. You would think it was locked, only to have it fold up on you while you were pushing it across the field loaded with baseball gear--not fun! After about 5 uses, the plastic mechanism that locks the sides in place broke. Piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Holland R.

customer_reviews.title: My only complaint which is extremely minor is
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product the only thing is that the utility bag that is on the top (where you push the cart) should have a different way to attach The bag is always off when I close or open the cart Other then that complain it is a great product I would recommend this product to everyone
customer_reviews.author: MurphNE

customer_reviews.title: The packaging is terrible and now I'm left with a broken cart that's ...
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box for the first time today after receiving it in April . It's been tucked away safe in my garage and upon opening this box both of the connections for the smaller wheels were busted. I wish I would've opened this package earlier so I could return it. The packaging is terrible and now I'm left with a broken cart that's of no use to me
customer_reviews.author: Zachery Parker

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love our wonder wheelers. This one does go better in the sand. A little hard to fold as the front wheeler tend to twist and you must adjust them. The bag that hangs at the handle is very poorly made and ripped at first use. Love the umbrella holder. Over all the is a must for the beach. This was a replacement for an earlier model that wore out after many years of use v
customer_reviews.author: glenda gail Ellerman

customer_reviews.title: Beach Day Ease
customer_reviews.text: We've used this cart twice now, the nylon bag behind the handle has torn from normal use so we aren't too thrilled with that, considering it's only been used twice. But, other than that we have found our travel to the surf much easier using this vehicle. It rolls quite well on the packed sand and it pulls with some muscle on loose sand. Our beach is mostly packed sand, so not a big issue. It holds a LOT. We have put folded chairs, an ice chest, several thick rolled towels, a beach blanket, dog dish, buckets and shovels and various kids toys. Handles quite well. We're satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: GavinsMom

customer_reviews.title: Life is a 'beach'
customer_reviews.text: It's our favorite 'toy' for going to the beach. It hold many bag, chairs and towels, plus toys and mats. We absolutely love it, it makes going to the beach so organized and easy. The large wheels make it super easy to navigate even in deep sand, it never feels heavy. You can pull it behind you or push it tipped off the smaller wheels. Where have you been all my beach life?
customer_reviews.author: Watership Down

customer_reviews.title: This cart is awful
customer_reviews.text: We own a Rio Beach Cart and this one is awful. I am not even sure it is Rio as there is no branding on the cart or instructions. The seller lists it as Rio. My husband put this thing together as per written instructions and it is a shaky piece of garbage. Down her in Fla it will not last a month...and that is generous. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Rolls great even over very loose sand.
customer_reviews.text: I live near a beach with very loose sand, and these wheels still manage to roll well. The cart makes it easy to go to the beach with kids. I load it up with 4 chairs, snacks, sunscreen & toys and it still manages to get over loose sand. Fully loaded and unfolded it fits in the back of my Toyota minivan easily. I love the side pocket for the beach umbrella. Also the top bag really keeps the sand away from my keys and camera. It also works well as a drink holder for the kids juice pouches and short water bottles. This is a must have item if you take kids to the beach frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: So glad we bought this for our beach trip! It made going to the beach with a toddler so much easier. This cart held everything we needed and there was room for more! So easy to move around too. We took off the big wheels to help make packing easier, but it really didn’t take up too much space. A must buy for family beach vacation:)
customer_reviews.author: Erica Kestner

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat price built to last
customer_reviews.text: Easy use in sand carries everything better than wagons I see people dragging on the beach and things falling out of them absolutely love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Latch. Company Won't Help.
customer_reviews.text: After putting it all together and folding it up, the latch won't stay. This is big and bulk (even folded up) but it will be harder to store and move around folded up if it won't stay folded. The company cannot find my order which makes returns or refunds impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: Worth Buying
customer_reviews.text: We used it at the beach last week everyday. Sure beats carrying all of our stuff out. I recommend this beach cart even if you only use it for a week. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our beach condo for our renters to use. It has done well through a busy season of many renters and we get a lot of compliments on the size and roominess.
customer_reviews.author: John Barlow

customer_reviews.title: they loved the convenience and not having to trudge through the ...
customer_reviews.text: Got all of our beach gear in one trip and no one complaining that they had too much. Some of our beach chairs didn't fit but 2 bungee cords solved the issue. Although my family laughed when I got it, they loved the convenience and not having to trudge through the sand with multiple items.
customer_reviews.author: ironmommy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product and Delivery
customer_reviews.text: I have had one of these beach carts for several years and bring with us to Universal to help me get around and so we will not have to carry everything. In July, we left for Universal and realized I left ours at home. I have a bad back and really need this or some other device I am too young to need. We purchased this and I am very happy. Only draw back is the big wheels. They are not needed at the parks, but at the beach they helped a lot. I will buy this product again and again, because it serves so many great purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Sulley Williams

customer_reviews.title: The wheel broke before I ever used it, and found it for a lower price elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Amazon was easy to work with for the return and refund - no complaints about Amazon. However, the snap the holds the wheel on broke during assembly. I planned to just exchange it but happened to see the same cart by the same manufacturer just in a different fabric pattern at a wholesale club - bought it there for $20 less than this price. No complaints on the quality of the second cart, still had the same cheap plastic part but we were extra careful with assembly and it is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Jen9254

product_meta.title: Rio Beach Wonder Wheeler Wide Beach Cart
product_meta.description:
The Wonder wheeler Wide, The largest of the series. This will make your day at the Beach more practical then ever before. This cart uses the same technology as a baby stroller. Huge 10 inch wheels and an extended neoprene handle makes handling a breeze. Full width back cover for extra durability, with an embroidered Back pocket for quick access storage.

AMAZON.COM
The Wonder Wheeler Wide from Rio Beach is an all-terrain cart designed to provide a hassle-free way carry heavy loads to and from the beach. Using the same technology as a baby stroller, the Wonder Wheeler has an extended push or pull handle with a neoprene grip for comfort. Outfitted with extra wide, 10-inch diameter rear wheels, the Wonder Wheeler cart offers the floatation required to pull a load over soft sand and bumpy paths. Meanwhile, the 4.5-inch diameter front wheels make pushing and navigating smooth paths and roadways easier. Built to carry loads of up to 100 pounds, the Wonder Wheeler provides ample space for a cooler, up to four beach chairs, a beach umbrella, and more. The cart provides multiple storage and access points for gear with a large mesh pouch, a removable tote bag, an umbrella holder, and a bottom tray and rack. When you've got your beach plot set up, simply fold the Wonder Wheeler up until you're ready to pack up and leave.

 Features:

 * Super wide rear wheels 
 * Articulating front wheels 
 * Extended neoprene handle 
 * Removable Tote Bag 
 * Side Umbrella Holder 
 * Large mesh pouch 
 * Rear Pouch 
 * Bottom tray and rack 
 * Folds easily for storage 

 Specifications:

 * Front wheel diameter: 4.5 inches 
 * Rear wheel diameter: 10 inches 
 * Chair load capacity: 4 chairs 
 * Storage area: 15 cubic feet 
 * Maximum weight capacity: 100 pounds
feature_bullets: Foldable beach cart with large all-terrain wheels
15-cubic feet of storage and a 100-pound weight capacity
Wide, all-terrain back wheels; articulating front wheels. Sturdy steel frame
Extended, stroller-style handle with neoprene grip
Deluxe removable tote bag; side umbrella holder; bottom tray and rack
